description:
In order to work at the same branch office, Veronica, Ninotchka and Dr. Love transfer to Chuta’s school. Chuta and Misuzu are shocked, but then Tateyan invites all the transfer students and Misuzu to go bowling. Chief Laine tells them that there were faint traces at SPH sensed at the bowling alley nearby and they go to investigate, but...
Source: crunchyroll
